app.title: Awake Lock - Keep Your Screen Awake
app.description: Prevent your device from going to sleep with intelligent wake lock management
app.subtitle: Prevent your device from going to sleep with intelligent wake lock management

wakeLock.title: Wake Lock Control
wakeLock.description: Prevent your device from going to sleep or turning off the screen
wakeLock.toggleDescription: Toggle to prevent your device from sleeping

wakeLockTypes.title: Wake Lock Type
wakeLockTypes.screenDescription: Screen wake lock prevents the display from turning off.
wakeLockTypes.systemDescription: System wake lock prevents the entire device from sleeping.

battery.warning: Wake locks may drain battery faster

details.title: Technical Details
details.description: Advanced information about the wake lock implementation

errors.compatibilityIssue: Your browser or device doesn't support wake lock functionality.
errors.tryDifferentBrowser: This feature requires a modern browser with Wake Lock API support. Please try using Chrome, Firefox, or Safari on a supported device.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure wake lock preferences and behavior

autoDisable.title: Auto-disable Timer
autoDisable.description: Automatically release wake lock after a specified duration
autoDisable.willDisable: Wake lock will be automatically released after {{duration}} minutes

battery.title: Battery Optimization
battery.description: Reduce battery consumption when wake lock is active
battery.reduces: Reduces screen brightness and disables unnecessary features

notifications.title: Notifications & Feedback
notifications.description: Configure how the app provides feedback about wake lock status
notifications.whenActivated: Get notified when wake lock is activated or deactivated

compatibility.title: Device Compatibility
compatibility.description: Information about wake lock support on your device

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.showTechnical: Show additional technical information and logs

about.title: About Awake Lock
about.description: Keep your device awake with intelligent wake lock management

whatIs.title: What is Awake Lock?
whatIs.description: Awake Lock is a modern web application that prevents your device from going to sleep or turning off the screen. It's perfect for presentations, reading, monitoring dashboards, or any activity where you need to keep your screen active.

compatibility.title: Browser Compatibility
compatibility.description: Wake Lock API support across different browsers
compatibility.fallbackNote: For browsers without native support, the app uses intelligent fallback strategies to maintain functionality.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.noDataCollection: No personal data is collected or transmitted
privacy.localProcessing: All processing happens locally in your browser
privacy.localStorage: Settings are stored locally using browser storage

footer.builtWith: Built with React, TypeScript, and the

compatibility.worksWith: Works on modern browsers with native Wake Lock API support
compatibility.browserList: Compatible with Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
